title: Stuck on reconnect
body:
Me and my friend were playing a Custom Game, and as we were in champion select, his league client crashed. When he rebooted his client, he was stuck on the reconnect screen, and when he pressed the button, nothing happened. While this was happening to my friend, I was stuck in the champion select screen, with the timer counted down to zero, and nothing happening. So, I tried restarting my client, and now I'm in the same boat as my friend.
We're both stuck on the reconnect screen with nothing to reconnect to.

Here's a link to the screen: https://gyazo.com/35c3eedf2c96227c256f753e756c224d
I'm sure a lot of you have seen this before, but unlike other times, the button does nothing.

Is there any fix for this? Has anyone else experienced this before?
